title: Not connecting after a bug splatting
body: Every game I been into the last couple days have been resulted in a Bug Splat. When this happens I am unable to get into the game at all. Every time i try to reconnect back into the game the bug splat appears again. This usually results in me not connecting as a result receiving a leave buster for something I have very little control over. Any help in solving this issue? Thank you

replies.body:
If you keep getting a bug splat every time you try to get into a match, there might be some game file that somehow became corrupted. If this happens, the game can function normally until it needs that specific asset, which once it tries to use that asset the client can't and then crashes.

Look over our [**Bug Splat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974), try the steps listed there, and you should be able to get back in the game!
